value.title: Microsoft Releases AI Training Library ZeRO-3 Offload
value.excerpt: Microsoft recently open-sourced ZeRO-3 Offload, an extension of their DeepSpeed AI training library that improves memory efficiency while training very large deep-learning models. ZeRO-3 Offload allows users to train models with up to 40 billion parameters on a single GPU and over 2 trillion parameters on 512 GPUs.

value.title: There’s Nothing Nuanced About Microsoft’s Plans For Voice Recognition Technology
value.excerpt: Microsoft's acquisition of Nuance, announced on Monday, has ended up closing at $19.7 billion, up 23% from the company’s share price on Friday, which makes it Microsoft’s second-largest acquisition after LinkedIn in June 2016 for $26.

value.title: Microsoft buying speech recognition firm in $16B deal
